channel.title: Compiling errors
channel.description: Ok I have 1 error and i'll post it here. [code]client.java:26512: illegal start of expression public boolean AttackNPC() { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I want to know what this means and how to fix it please. Can anyone help?

item.title: Compiling errors
item.dc:creator: @medal_star90 medal_star90
item.description:
@medal_star90 wrote:

First of all Dont spam in his thread.
My steps are eays

Step 1.

public boolean AttackNPC

Copy that…

Step 2. Look in client.java and under edit click find.

Step 3. Paste

public boolean AttackNPC

Step 4. replace with

[code]public boolean AttackNPC() {
int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX;
int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY;
int EnemyHP = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].HP;
int hitDiff = 0;
int Npchitdiff = 0;
int wepdelay = 0;
CalculateMaxHit();
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit);
int casterX = absX;
int casterY = absY;
int offsetX = (casterX - EnemyX) * -1;
int offsetY = (casterY - EnemyY) * -1;

faceNPC(attacknpc);
//viewTo(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX, server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY);

if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer < 1 || server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].followPlayer == playerId || inwildy2 == true) {
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (1333)) //rune scimi here

{
PkingDelay = 4;
wepdelay = 4;
}[/code]
So pretty much thats all Just find outa mine what is missing out of yours and replace wiht that! good luck!!!

Read full topic
